Management Classes¶

class lab_clinic_api.classes.Lis(db, **kwargs)

Bases: object

Import from django-lis

Lis.import_from_lis(**kwargs)

Imports data from the django-lis for each model in the relational model including list models.

The relational model is Receive > Aliquot > Order > Result > ResultItem List models are panel, test_code, aliquot_type, aliquot_condition

Using get_or_create(), if instances do not exist they will be created.

If the source patient identifier cannot be linked to an instance of registered subject, the data is not imported and an error is loggged in model LisImportError.

Note: List models on the target (edc) are not the same models as source. That is list models on target come from lab_clinic_api and on source come from lab_panel, lab_aliquot_list, etc. For example target.panel != source.panel yet the attribute values of panel instance on target and source are the same (see isinstance() test for ForeignKey fields below).

Lis.update_from_lis(subject_identifier)

Update the Edc labs for a given subject_identifier from the Lis.
